alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 04 at 7:29PM MST until December 05 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation including freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Pockets of freezing rain will cause icy conditions across the Cache Valley through the late evening. Even when freezing rain changes to snow, a little glaze of ice will make conditions particularly difficult in some locations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
